short_summary: Supply and Delivery of Shell and Tube Heat Exchanger at 5th Canadian Division Support Base Gagetown, located in Oromocto, New Brunswick,  with delivery dates on or before March 31st, 2023
description: Services publics et Approvisionnement Canada, on behalf of the ministère de la Défense nationale, needs the supply and delivery of Shell and Tube Heat Exchanger to 5 Div C Gagetown, located in Oromocto.
